document_data.mainbody:
Darthag Ulgar was a merchant of the Lionshield Coster and the operator of their trading post in Nightstone during the late 15 century DR.
Darthag was formerly married to Alaestra Ulgar, who ran the Lionshield trading post in Triboar.
When a cloud giant rained stones down on Nightstone in the late 15 century, Darthag managed to survive for some time. When goblins raided the town shortly thereafter, he was abducted to their nearby caves and slain. He was then feasted upon by giant rats.
